comment.text: This translation key is used to display a reset application button label in various parts of the user interface, including a modal dialog and a login settings section. It prompts users to "Reset Application" and is typically displayed as a prominent action button or link.

usage.context:
<Text>{t("ResetApplicationDescription")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 key="ResetSendBtn"
 label={t("Common:ResetApplication")}
 size="normal"
 scale
 primary
 onClick={resetApp}
 />

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Arabic translation 'إعادة  تشغيل التطبيق' literally translates to 'Restart Application'. While 'Reset' and 'Restart' can be synonymous in some contexts, 'Reset' typically implies returning to a default state, which is not necessarily what 'Restart' conveys. A more accurate translation might consider the intended functionality of 'Reset'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'إعادة ضبط التطبيق' (I'aadat Dabt al-Tatbeeq) which translates to 'Reset Application' or 'إعادة تهيئة التطبيق' (I'aadat Tahyi'at al-Tatbeeq) which translates to 'Reinitialize Application', depending on the precise intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "애플리케이션 리셋" is understandable, a more natural and accurate translation of "Reset application" would be "애플리케이션 초기화" or "앱 초기화". "리셋" is used, but "초기화" is more commonly used for application resets.

The Lao translation "ຕັ້ງຄ່າແອບຄືນ" translates more literally to "set up app again" or "re-setup application." It doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "reset application," which implies returning the application to a default state or a previous configuration.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ຣີເຊັດແອບພຶcation" (which transliterates "reset application") or "ສືບສືບແອບພຶcation" (meaning restore/return to original state). The best option depends on the specific context and common usage in Lao.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'යෙදුම යළි සකසන්න' is understandable, a more natural and accurate translation of 'Reset application' would be 'අප්ලිකේෂන් යළි සැකසීම' or 'අප්ලිකේෂන් නැවත සැකසීම'.  'සකසන්න' can imply fixing or repairing, not necessarily a full reset.

While 'Ресетуј апликацију' is understandable, a more accurate and natural-sounding translation of 'Reset application' in Serbian (Cyrillic) would be 'Постављање апликације на почетак' or 'Враћање апликације на почетак'.  'Ресетуј' is a transliteration and might not be the most appropriate terminology for all users.
